RIS (Radiology Information System)
Purpose: Manages the radiology department’s workflow from order to report.
Core Modules & Functions:
• Scheduling & Registration: Exam booking, modality scheduling, patient prep instructions • Worklist Management: Prioritization, assignment rules (e.g., STAT vs. routine), modality-specific queues • Reporting & Templates: Structured reporting, voice dictation integration, peer-review workflows • Billing & Coding: Automated exam coding (CPT, ICD), charge capture, insurance pre-authorization
Architecture & Integration:
• Connects tightly with PACS for image availability and with EHR for order validation (HL7 ORM/OUL transactions) • May integrate with dose-tracking systems and radiation safety monitoring
Example Software Highlights:
• GE Centricity RIS: Customizable worklists, embedded speech recognition, radiation dose analytics • Philips RIS: Multi-site workflow orchestration, AI-driven exam assignment, business intelligence dashboards
